[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1667694917981{margin-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #e2efff !important;}” el_class=”SPRow SPRowFull”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”9267″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Alessandro Repici” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667694925183{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]MD Professor of Gastroenterology,

Director of Endoscopy,

Humanitas University, Italy[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Biography” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667694896030{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”SpTitlesFull”]Prof. Alessandro Repici is Director of Endoscopy Unit in Humanitas Research Hospital. Graduated in Medicine and Surgery in 1990 and the following year he won a scholarship at the Department of Gastroenterology Molinette hospital in Turin, where he began his practice in digestive endoscopy. In 1992, he worked with Prof. Claude Liguory as a fellow at the American Hospital in Paris.

 

In 1994 he became a specialist in Gastroenterology and Digestive Endoscopy at the University of Messina in 1995 and practiced in the Department of Gastroenterology, Ospedale Maggiore Molinette of Turin.

 [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
